Set-AdminPowerAppEnvironmentRuntimeState API_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.66:_x000D__x000A_ Add SubscriptionBasedTrial SKU support._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.65:_x000D__x000A_ Add Get-AdminPowerAppOperationStatus API for async scenario support._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.64:_x000D__x000A_ Added new APIs:_x000D__x000A_ Copy-PowerAppEnvironment,_x000D__x000A_ Backup-PowerAppEnvironment,_x000D__x000A_ Get-PowerAppEnvironmentBackups,_x000D__x000A_ Restore-PowerAppEnvironment,_x000D__x000A_ Remove-PowerAppEnvironmentBackup,_x000D__x000A_ Reset-PowerAppEnvironment_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.63:_x000D__x000A_ Added DoD support. Fix bug PowerShell Cmdlet "Set-AdminPowerAppRoleAssignment" is broken when setting the tenant sharing._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.61:_x000D__x000A_ BREAKING CHANGE: Changed return value to environment object when New-AdminPowerAppEnvironment CDS provision completed._x000D__x000A_ Fixed empty return error bug (error code and error message will be returned when API fails)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.60:_x000D__x000A_ Add TimeoutInMinutes parameter in New-AdminPowerAppEnvironment to make timeout configurable._x000D__x000A_ BREAKING CHANGE: The default timeout is changed to a week (waiting for server timeout)._x000D__x000A_ Fixed "Cannot bind argument to parameter 'Route' because it is an empty string" exception for New-AdminPowerAppEnvironment._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.59:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed removing connector from policy that had been added with an invalid connector ID._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.57:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed pagination problem for Get-DlpPolicy, Get-AdminFlow, and Get-AdminPowerApp._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.56:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed duplicate key error for ConvertFrom-Json with case-invariant comparison._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.53:_x000D__x000A_ Added early Public Preview release of DLP (Data Loss Prevention) v2 PowerShell cmdlets_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.52:_x000D__x000A_ Introduced new cmdlets for admins to list and recover deleted Power Apps_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.45:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed missing Example sections for some incorrectly formatted cmdlet headers_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.44:_x000D__x000A_ Added a cmdlet to download a manifest of all user's Power Apps licenses for a tenant_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.42:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed cmdlet deadlock issue when long-running operations reached a timeout condition_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.40:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed set of codes to wait for when long-running operations were checking for status_x000D__x000A_ Fixed an incorrect error message when creating a CDS database environment failed_x000D__x000A_ Fixed defective ability to associate new DLP policies with specific environments_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.37:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed bug when deserializing "Common Data Service for Apps" environment information_x000D__x000A_ Introduced new cmdlets for admins to get and set additional notification emails_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.34:_x000D__x000A_ Added logic to skip filtered flows that could not be deserialized instead of failing_x000D__x000A_ Fixed bug that prevented paging from working properly when getting all flows as admin_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.33:_x000D__x000A_ Enabled creation of new environments as type Sandbox [addition to Trial and Production]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.31:_x000D__x000A_ Introduced new cmdlets for admins to list and recover soft-deleted environments_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.27:_x000D__x000A_ Revamp cmdlets to block and allow consent plans in response to breaking service change_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.26:_x000D__x000A_ Fixed a handful of bugs related to parameters to create new CDS database environments_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.19:_x000D__x000A_ Introduced new cmdlet to get all CDS database templates so all inputs are retrievable_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.15:_x000D__x000A_ Introduced new cmdlet to sync licensed and authorized AAD tenant user into environment_x000D__x000A_ Fixed bugs in limited Private Preview cmdlets for DLP v1 connector Blocking [obsolete]_x000D__x000A_ Added limited Private Preview cmdlets for DLP v1 connector Blocking [obsolete]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.12:_x000D__x000A_ Introduced new cmdlets to block and allow consent plans in tenant_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_2.0.6:_x000D__x000A_ Added support for the Verbose flag to extend to internal calls
